text: @CNN how come there are no reports of a flu spike among 1000's of"protesters"these past weeks? none! covid19, altho a stronger strain of"flu", this entire scientific scare tactic has now become political. with mask you're democrat. no mask, you're a trump supporter. @realDonaldTrump
